#IMBD Ratings of movies Vs Production Company

```{r}
ggplot(MovieCleanFull = MovieCleanFull$Title, mapping = aes(x = MovieCleanFull$imdbRating, y = MovieCleanFull$Production)) + geom_col()
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ggplot(MovieCleanFull = MovieCleanFull$Title, mapping = aes(x = MovieCleanFull$imdbRating, y = MovieCleanFull$Production, MovieCleanFull$Writer)) + geom_col()
```




#ImBD Ratings vs Writers
